Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it would be a perfect fit for you. Given its high-quality features and benefits, we are offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $14995. We are confident that this investment will provide substantial value and satisfaction for years to come. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,995. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,995
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
